Reference

Read Data

createH5LigerDataset()

Create on-disk ligerDataset Object

createLiger()

Create liger object

createLigerDataset()

Create in-memory ligerDataset object

readLiger()

Read liger object from RDS file

read10X() read10XRNA() read10XATAC()

Load in data from 10X

restoreH5Liger() restoreOnlineLiger()

Restore links (to HDF5 files) for reloaded liger/ligerDataset object

importVignetteData()

Import prepared dataset publically available

as.ligerDataset()

Converting other classes of data to a as.ligerDataset object

as.liger()

Converting other classes of data to a liger object

pbmc

liger object of PBMC subsample data with Control and Stimulated datasets

pbmcPlot

liger object of PBMC subsample data with plotting information available

bmmc

liger object of bone marrow subsample data with RNA and ATAC modality

Preprocessing

runGeneralQC()

General QC for liger object

removeMissing() removeMissingObs()

Remove missing cells or features from liger object

normalize() normalizePeak()

Normalize raw counts data

selectGenes()

Select a subset of informative genes

scaleNotCenter()

Scale genes by root-mean-square across cells

reverseMethData()

Create "scaled data" for DNA methylation datasets

downsample()

Downsample datasets

selectGenesVST()

Select variable gene from one dataset with VST method

Integration

runIntegration()

Integrate scaled datasets with iNMF or variant methods

quantileNorm()

Quantile Align (Normalize) Factor Loadings

runINMF()

Perform iNMF on scaled datasets

runOnlineINMF()

Perform online iNMF on scaled datasets

runUINMF()

Perform Mosaic iNMF (UINMF) on scaled datasets with unshared features

optimizeNewData()

Perform factorization for new data

optimizeNewK()

Perform factorization for new value of k

optimizeNewLambda()

Perform factorization for new lambda value

optimizeSubset()

Perform factorization for subset of data

suggestK()

Visually suggest appropiate k value

suggestLambda()

Visually suggest appropriate lambda value

Downstream Analysis

runUMAP()

Perform UMAP Dimensionality Reduction

runTSNE()

Perform t-SNE dimensionality reduction

runCluster()

SNN Graph Based Community Detection

runPairwiseDEG() runMarkerDEG()

Find DEG between two groups

runWilcoxon()

Perform Wilcoxon rank-sum test

runPseudoBulkDEG()

Run DESeq2 differential expression test on pseudo-bulk expression

getFactorMarkers()

Find shared and dataset-specific markers

runDoubletFinder()

Doublet detection with DoubletFinder

runGSEA()

Analyze biological interpretations of metagene

runGOEnrich()

Run Gene Ontology enrichment analysis on metagenes

ATAC Specific Analysis

imputeKNN()

Impute the query cell expression matrix

linkGenesAndPeaks()

Linking genes to putative regulatory elements

exportInteractTrack()

Export predicted gene-pair interaction

Visualization

plotCellScatter()

Generate scatter plot(s) using liger object

plotCellViolin()

Generate violin/box plot(s) using liger object

plotClusterFactorDot()

Make dot plot of factor loading in cell groups

plotClusterGeneDot()

Make dot plot of gene expression in cell groups

plotDensityDimRed()

Create density plot basing on specified coordinates

plotClusterDimRed() plotDatasetDimRed() plotByDatasetAndCluster() plotGeneDimRed() plotPeakDimRed() plotFactorDimRed()

Generate Dimensionality Reduction Plot with Coloring

plotGeneLoadings() plotGeneLoadingRank()

Visualize factor expression and gene loading

plotGeneHeatmap() plotFactorHeatmap()

Plot Heatmap of Gene Expression or Factor Loading

plotProportion() plotProportionDot() plotProportionBar() plotClusterProportions() plotProportionPie()

Visualize proportion across two categorical variables

plotSuggestK()

Visualize suggestK result statistics

plotSuggestLambda()

Visualize suggestLambda result statistics

plotVarFeatures()

Plot the variance vs mean of feature expression

plotGeneViolin() plotTotalCountViolin() plotGeneDetectedViolin()

Visualize gene expression or cell metadata with violin plot

plotVolcano() plotEnhancedVolcano()

Create volcano plot for Wilcoxon test result

plotWordClouds()

Generate word clouds and t-SNE plots

makeRiverplot()

Generate a river (Sankey) plot

.ggCellViolin()

Produce single violin plot with data frame passed from upstream

.ggScatter()

Produce single scatter plot with data frame passed from upstream

.ggplotLigerTheme()

Generic ggplot theme setting for rliger package

.plotHeatmap()

General heatmap plotting with prepared matrix and data.frames

.complexHeatmapDotPlot()

Generate dot plot from input matrix with ComplexHeatmap

Evaluation Metrics

calcARI-deprecated

[Deprecated] Calculate adjusted Rand index

calcAgreement-deprecated

[Deprecated] Calculate agreement metric

calcAlignment()

Calculate alignment metric

calcAlignmentPerCluster-deprecated

[Deprecated] Calculate alignment for each cluster

calcDatasetSpecificity()

Calculate a dataset-specificity score for each factor

calcNormLoadings()

Calculate loadings for each factor

calcPurity-deprecated

[Deprecated] Calculate purity

Object Class

liger-class liger show,liger-method dim,liger-method dimnames,liger-method dimnames [,liger,character,missing,ANY-method [,liger,missing,index,ANY-method [,liger,character,index,ANY-method datasets datasets datasets,liger-method datasets datasets dataset dataset dataset,liger,character_OR_NULL-method dataset,liger,missing-method dataset,liger,numeric-method dataset dataset dataset names,liger-method names length,liger-method cellMeta cellMeta cellMeta,liger,NULL-method cellMeta,liger,character-method cellMeta,liger,missing-method cellMeta cellMeta [[,liger,ANY,missing-method [[ $,liger-method $ defaultCluster defaultCluster defaultCluster,liger-method defaultCluster defaultCluster defaultCluster dimRed dimRed dimRed,liger,missing-method dimRed,liger,character-method dimRed defaultDimRed defaultDimRed defaultDimRed,liger-method defaultDimRed defaultDimRed varFeatures varFeatures varFeatures,liger-method varFeatures fortify.liger c.liger commands commands,liger-method rawData,liger-method rawData rawData normData,liger-method normData normData scaleData,liger,ANY-method scaleData scaleData scaleData scaleUnsharedData,liger,character-method scaleUnsharedData,liger,numeric-method getMatrix,liger,ANY,ANY,ANY-method getH5File,liger,ANY-method

liger class

ligerATACDataset-class ligerATACDataset

Subclass of ligerDataset for ATAC modality

show(<ligerCommand>)

ligerCommand object: Record the input and time of a LIGER function call

show(<ligerDataset>) dim(<ligerDataset>) dimnames(<ligerDataset>) `dimnames<-`(<ligerDataset>,<list>) `[`(<ligerDataset>,<index>,<missing>,<ANY>) `[`(<ligerDataset>,<missing>,<index>,<ANY>) `[`(<ligerDataset>,<index>,<index>,<ANY>) rawData() `rawData<-`() normData() `normData<-`() scaleData() `scaleData<-`() scaleUnsharedData() `scaleUnsharedData<-`() getMatrix() h5fileInfo() `h5fileInfo<-`() getH5File() featureMeta() `featureMeta<-`() cbind(<ligerDataset>)

ligerDataset class

ligerRNADataset-class ligerRNADataset

Subclass of ligerDataset for RNA modality

rawPeak() `rawPeak<-`() normPeak() `normPeak<-`()

Access ligerATACDataset peak data

retrieveCellFeature()

Retrieve a single matrix of cells from a slot

subsetLiger()

Subset liger object

subsetLigerDataset() subsetH5LigerDataset() subsetMemLigerDataset()

Subset ligerDataset object

convertOldLiger()

Convert old liger object to latest version

ligerToSeurat()

Convert between liger and Seurat object

Misc

H5Apply()

Apply function to chunks of H5 data in ligerDataset object

commandDiff()

Check difference of two liger command

isH5Liger()

Check if a liger or ligerDataset object is made of HDF5 file

makeFeatureMatrix()

Fast calculation of feature count matrix

mergeH5()

Merge hdf5 files

mergeSparseAll() mergeDenseAll()

Merge matrices while keeping the union of rows

modalOf()

Return preset modality of a ligerDataset object or that of all datasets in a liger object

closeAllH5()

Close all links (to HDF5 files) of a liger object

[Deprecated] Perform iNMF on scaled datasets

readSubset()

[Deprecated] See downsample

Quantile align (normalize) factor loadings

getProportionMito()
